content: At University in Japan, I majored in Kendo at the Department of Martial Arts, Faculty of Physical Education, and at the same time obtained a health and physical education teacher license from junior high school and high school. Then after graduating from university, I majored in interpreting and translation when studying abroad, and is good at communicating in English. Then after joining EPknoT Co., Ltd., I have been engaged in documentation and project management related to SLB project composition.
Study abroad in America for 2 years
2021: Joined Epknot after returning to Japan
work: Work in charge: Project Introduction, Documentation, Project Management
